help.name: mris_make_surfaces
help.description: This program positions the tessellation of the cortical surface at the white matter surface, then the gray matter surface and generate surface files for these surfaces as well as a 'curvature' file for the cortical thickness, and a surface file which approximates layer IV of the cortical sheet.

optional-flagged.explanation: output name for white surface (def is white). Set to NOWHITE to generate but not save white surface. Not to be confused with -nowhite
output name for pial surface (def is pial)
Only generate white matter surface
Only generate pial surface (use ?h.white or whatever is specified with -orig_white as white surface)
specify a white surface to start with
specify a pial surface to start with
Omit self-intersection and only generate gray/white surface
in white deformation set outside_hi = (max_border_white + mgs*max_gray) / (mgs+1.0)
Do not create curvature and area files from white matter surface
Set to 0 to turn off creation of cortex label file
Average curvature values <avgs> times (default=10)
Settle WM surface at first peak in intensity profile instead of highest
unknown
